title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - Unnamed Road
title_short: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - Unnamed Road

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros -
description: Great place to spend the day quietly or to sleep if you are not afraid, because you are lonely. You can do the bike route around the lagoons or walk to the small lagoon to see the migratory birds.

It has good access and has two picnic areas with shade. Only bad point that if it is very hot there is a bad smell because the purifier is next to it.

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - 2 Calle Sierrecilla

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - 140 A-4

description: Next to a gas station, a little noisy by the passage of trucks but sure.

title: (13210) Villarta de San Juan - Autovía del Sur

title: (45700) Consuegra - Unnamed Road

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan -

title: (45710) Madridejos - 69N Plaza Rústica-86

Gravel car park at the foot of the castle and the mills, with picnic tables, ideal for an overnight stay
Very quiet and superb view of the castle lit up at night.
The town itself is a 10 minute walk away.
The walk to the top is difficult and you should take your time.
The road that goes up to the mills / castles is prohibited for equipped vehicles!

title: () - N-310
description: Old service area, with the gas station closed. very wide and lonely. some truck spends the night.

title: (45820) El Toboso - 3 Camino Mota

El Toboso, the village of Dulcinea, is beautiful and perfectly preserved. Casa de Dulcinea Museum, Centro Cervantino with a magnificent collection of Don Quichote copies that belonged to famous people, very beautiful church. Must.

title_short: (13710) Argamasilla de Alba - 5 Carretera la Solana-Tomelloso

It took us about 20 minutes to understand how registration works to access the area. a document (Italian identity card is fine) and then enter all the data including the vehicle license plate. The camera will recognize the license plate and open the gate. For the pedestrian gate instead there is a code on the receipt ticket (not lose it) to access the area.

title: (13620) Pedro Muñoz - 18 Carretera el Toboso

title: (13620) Pedro Muñoz - 11 Paseo de la Mota

title: (13250) Daimiel - Unnamed Road

description: Parking in vacant level land. Near the center and to visit the pizzeria of recognized international prestige Marquinetti. There is no service.

Sale of butane and propane, firewood and biomass. It has a free shower for guests and a cafeteria. Very clean bathrooms with breastfeeding area. Shop with local products. The owner has another low cost gas station next to this one with great fuel discounts and a wash area. You can park and sleep without problem in one of its esplanades.

title: (13700) Tomelloso - 11 Calle 20 A

title: (13250) Daimiel - Unnamed Road

title: (45820) El Toboso -

title: (45780) Tembleque - 6A Carretera Andalucía
description: Public parking of the Tembleque Sports Complex. A bit far from the center of town but a very quiet and safe place to spend the night. We came here because in the other place in the marked town they threw stones at the motorhome. I recommend this place to stay overnight.

title: (13680) Fuente el Fresno - Unnamed Road

title: (45789) Caserío Venta Vieja -

Not so difficult to access through sand roads. ok for bigger vans.

the spot is very calm, 100% nature. it's beautiful as well. But! 

it's a little dirty... we gathered 4 big trash bags in a 50m radius and were happy to clean the nature a little.

come with your kids and teach them to clean natural spots!

nasty bits appart, it's beautiful and calm and in the middle of nowhere, I'll come again to clean a different spot:)

title: (45789) Turleque -

title: (45780) Tembleque - Unnamed Road

title: (45789) Turleque -

title: (13200) Manzanares - 21 Calle Olimpia

title: (45810) Villanueva de Alcardete -

description: It is a restaurant to eat very well and cheap, perfect parking.

title: (13240) La Solana - 29 Calle Soledad
description: Automatic laundry with many washing machines including machines for washing pet accessories, it has free wifi, change machine, coffee machine and spreader.

title: (13240) La Solana - 5 Avenida de la Paz
title_short: (13240) La Solana - 5 Avenida de la Paz
description: La Solana motorhome area, area with very spacious pitches, well leveled and with shaded areas. It has all the services, including bathrooms with showers. Of course, there is a charge for the zone and each service is chargeable apart from the night service. Located in a park, 10 minutes walk from the center. Perfect to spend a night, discover the city, buy La Mancha products. Good area near (30 km) from the natural park of Las Lagunas de Ruidera.

title: () La Guardia - 117 Urbanización Santo Niño
description: Large, flat earthen car park a stone's throw from the Hermitage of Santo Niño completely free access but no shade but tranquility guaranteed you are far from any service but it is not very far from the highway

title: () La Guardia - Unnamed Road
description: A couple of picnic tables and several benches in an unpopulated area but very close to the highway, making it a good place to stop for lunch or rest.

title: () Toledo - Unnamed Road
description: Rest area La Guardia. With enough trees and picnic tables. Ideal to rest on the way to the south and especially at noon. Source with non-potable water.

title: () La Guardia - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place by the highway in the fields. Ideal for one night

title: (45760) La Guardia - 79 Autovía del Sur
description: Large parking at the edge of the highway behind a hotel restaurant. Plenty of room to put in the background to avoid noise

title: (45760) La Guardia -
description: Nice spot to spend the night next to a ruined building. Quite large with very clear view and beautiful sunset Slightly uneven track but doable in Van. Pay attention to the route proposed by the gps. To get there, go through the Camino de la Laguna at La Guardia then continue straight ahead #BOF

title: (13310) Consolación -
description: Fantastic winery to visit in Consuegra. Live the history of tradition and enjoy the experiences in a winery of yesteryear. We will be open on weekends and holidays and that it is necessary to make a reservation in advance to make the visit.

title: (13310) Valdepeñas - CRP-5214
description: Esplanade with gas station and restaurant bar. The bar is open all night. Many trucks spend the night. In the restaurant we dined very well and the attention was excellent. Being glued to the highway early in the morning you could hear the traffic.
